label: Description
value: Roman figures preparing a sacrifice at an altar under an elaborate canopy with a female figure holding a crown representing Fortune with a putti holding a Phrygian cap pointing to an open book in symmetry with Fame with a trumpet all on the right side. On the left, the figure of France in a chariot drawn by two lions accompanied by figures representing Wisdom, Hope and an unknown figure under a temple containing an eternal flame. All surrounded with drapery and elements of French gardens. In red on white.
